Summary: EXACTLY LIKE FIRE SPINNING ABOVE MY HEAD
divs: Sighting Details I WAS VISITING FRIENDS, WENT TO THERE HOUSE ON THE BEACH, THE INSTANT I WALKED INTO THERE HOME I FELT DEATHLY SICK, I TOLD MY MOTHER I WAS GOING TO THE CAR TO SIT DOWN, I WAS ALONE I FELT WEIRD, BUT THIS IS NOT USUAL FOR ME. MY HAIR STARTED BLOWING, I WAS IN A LAGRE PARKING LOT ALONE. I LOOKED UP AND RIGHT ABOVE MY HEAD AS TALL AS THE TREES, WAS THE HUGE SHIP WAS EXACTLY LIKE FIRE SPINNING AND IT LOOKED LIKE THE HUGE TREES NEAR BY WERE BURNING BUT THREY WERENT. TWO MEN WHO LOOKED JUST LIKE US, WERE ALL OF THE SUDDDEN STANDING THERE. " THEY SAID TO ME WE HAVE COME TO TAKE YOU HOME" AND I SAID BUT I CAN'T GO FOR MY MOTHER WAS VERY SICK AND I TOOK CARE OF HER. AND I HAD TO BEG NOT TO GO, I WAS VERY,VERY, AFRAID THEY WERE GOING TO TAKE ME ANY HOW, SO I SAID THE LORDS PRAYER OVER AND OVER. THEY TURNED AROUND AND SMILED AND SAID, THEY UNDERSTOOD. AND SAID THEY WOULD BE BACK SOME DAY TO GET ME. THE SAUCER JUST LIFTED UP QUIETLY AND WENT OFF TO THE EAST.
trends: There have been 151 other sightings in San Diego
There were no other sightings in San Diego on or around November 30th 1972
